name: javascript
subtitle: JavaScript
about: JavaScript is a lightweight, interpreted, object-oriented language with first-class functions, most known as the scripting language for Web pages, but used in many non-browser environments as well such as Node.js or Apache CouchDB. It is a prototype-based, multi-paradigm scripting language that is dynamic, and supports object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.

books.title: Human JavaScript
books.description: This is a book about a specific set of tools, patterns, and approaches that we feel are optimized for people. These approaches enable our team to quickly build and deliver high-quality JavaScript applications for humans.
books.author: Henrik Joreteg
books.name: human_javascript

books.title: Understanding ECMAScript 6
books.description: This book is intended as a guide for those who are already familiar with JavaScript and ECMAScript 5. While a deep understanding of the language isnâ€™t necessary to use this book, it is helpful in understanding the differences between ECMAScript 5 and 6.
books.author: Nicholas C. Zakas
books.name: understanding_ecmascript_6

books.title: Writing Modular JavaScript With AMD, CommonJS & ES Harmony
books.description: In this article, we're going to look at three formats for writing modular JavaScript: AMD, CommonJS and proposals for the next version of JavaScript, Harmony.
books.author: Addy Osmani
books.name: writing_modular_javascript_with_amd,_commonjs_&_es_harmony

books.title: Patterns For Large-Scale JavaScript Application architecture
books.description: In this book we're going to discuss an effective set of patterns for large-scale JavaScript application architecture.
books.author: Addy Osmani
books.name: patterns_for_large-scale_javascript_application_architecture

books.title: Learning JavaScript Design Patterns
books.description: In this book we will explore applying both classical and modern design patterns to the JavaScript programming language.
books.author: Addy Osmani
books.name: learning_javascript_design_patterns

books.title: ECMAScript Language Specification
books.description: Learn all about the Javacript language specifications with this official ECMA-262 bible.
books.author: ECMA International
books.name: ecmascript_language_specification

books.title: JavaScript Succinctly
books.description: If you are a designer or developer who has only used JavaScript under the mantle of libraries (such as jQuery, Prototype, etc.), it is my hope that the material in this book will transform you from a JavaScript library user into a JavaScript developer.
books.author: Cody Lindley
books.name: javascript_succinctly
